documents.document: We endorse this statement, the authenticity of the information. We have been working closely with the Government of India for the past year thank it for its support. We remain committed to ramping up our vaccine production to save every life we can. https://t.co/tLVPjOMp51

...situated at the Special Economic Zone at Manjri. We are deeply saddened and offer our condolences to the families of the departed. In this regard, we will be offering a compensation of INR 25 lakhs to each of the families, in addition to the mandated amount as per the norms.

RT @adarpoonawalla: As Id mentioned earlier, we should not jump to conclusions until the trials are fully concluded. The recent chain of e

We are reviewing the situation and pausing India trials till @AstraZeneca restarts them. We are following DCGI's instructions and will not be able to comment further on the same. You can connect with DCGI for more updates on this front. #SII #Latestnews #Covid_19 https://t.co/CUeFY5oLus

We (Serum Institute of India), were going by DCGI's direction and were not instructed to pause thetrials. If DCGI has any safety concerns, we will adhere to their instructions and abide by the standard protocols. https://t.co/u0yaGAU0Eo

We (Serum Institute of India) can't comment on reports of AstraZeneca pausing the trials in the UK, other than that they have been paused for review and shall restart soon. The Indian trials are continuing and we have faced no issues at all. #SII #COVID19 #Latestnews https://t.co/HWPUrQydWc

We would like to clarify that the current media claim on COVISHIELD's availability in 73 days is misleading. Phase-3 trials are still underway. We will officially confirm its availability. Read clarification statement here - https://t.co/FvgClzcnHr #SII #COVID19 #LatestNews https://t.co/mQWrqgbzO4

Being the worlds largest vaccine manufacturer by number of doses produced and sold globally, we have always aimed at protecting lives. SII assures quick decisions and undertakes enormous risks, such as our fight against COVID-19. https://t.co/whwR1oy7t5 #SII #COVID19 #vaccine

We have always aimed at saving lives with our Hepatitis vaccines covering everyone across the globe. On World Hepatitis Day, #TogetherWeFight to voice out to protect the world from this virus for a better tomorrow. #SII #WorldHepatitisDay #EliminateHepatitis https://t.co/7VSJNt3OVP
Our CEO, @adarpoonawalla, is leaving no stone unturned to launch Covishield vaccine as early as possible. #SII #Covid_19 #CoronaVirusUpdate #vaccine https://t.co/6fyeSain9c
We hope to manufacture two to three million doses by end of August, pending certain licensing and approvals from the government. https://t.co/mMSoYf99DE #SII #Covid_19 #vaccine #coronavirus

Our CEO, @adarpoonawalla, in conversation with @Zakka_Jacob on @CNNnews18 discusses how the vaccine is likely to be released in December or first quarter of 2021, pending necessary approvals from the government. #SII #Covid_19 #COVID19Update #vaccines https://t.co/NpnGQyX86A

Our CEO, @adarpoonawalla, in conversation with @ETNOWlive, says, We saw a good T-cell response which means people will have long-term protection coming about. https://t.co/GDT5pnO3UX #SII #Covid_19 #vaccines #coronavirus #COVIDUpdates

We hope to begin phase three of the human trials of COVID-19 vaccine in India in August, which will see around 4,000 5,000 volunteers. https://t.co/yrkL7mLrPw #SII #COVID19Update #vaccine #coronavirus

Our CEO, @adarpoonawalla, in conversation with @BDUTT, says, We are very well poised and will be playing a major role, because of our capacity and ability to produce. #SII #Covid_19 #coronavirus #vaccines https://t.co/RetKeZuA6J

Covishield will be launched if the trials are successful in UK and India. Our CEO, @adarpoonawalla, says at least 300 million doses of the potential vaccine will be ready by December 2020. https://t.co/KmOFIJnc52 #SII #COVID #vaccines #CoronavirusVaccine

COVID-19 vaccine update: We are aiming to get 20-40 million vaccine shots available to the Indian market by September-October at an affordable price of 1,000/ dose. https://t.co/GHAPQUd2UU

We are extremely thrilled to share that Serum Institute of India has not one but two vaccine candidates in its arsenal against the novel coronavirus (Covid-19). Both candidates are likely to enter human trials in India by September-October. https://t.co/bcL50eTOIY #SII #Vaccine
A vaccine to combat COVID-19 in the pipeline to be ready by 2021. https://t.co/BqdAaiJnIh #SII #Vaccine #coronavirus #covid19 #coronavirusvaccine https://t.co/L5rLB4oL1S

Serum Institute of India in the development phase for Live Attenuated Vaccines(LAV) to combat the pandemic. https://t.co/oL8V3UTHWk #SII #Vaccine #Coronavirus

In a first of its kind collaboration, Serum Institute of India and New York-based Codagenix Inc co-develop a live-attenuated vaccine(LAV) that is nearly as strong as that triggered by an infection with the wild-type pathogen. Read on to know more. https://t.co/w7FhCkHmXe

As the Coronavirus outbreak intensifies across the country, the #government has designated #test centers in various states. Heres listing down the testing facilities currently authorized to test in the country. Contact them at the earliest in case of developing symptoms. #SII https://t.co/RWAvHhPun1

Researchers and scientists from around the world are racing against time to develop a vaccine against the virus. Until then we urge you to strictly follow personal hygiene measures and practice social distancing to keep yourself safe and healthy. #SII #vaccine https://t.co/YNQgY5IS0o

As per WHO officials, healthy people dont need to wear masks. Only when a person develops a cough and fever, he/she becomes a suspected patient and needs to switch to medical masks to prevent the spread of the virus. Here are some dos and donts of wearing a mask. #SII https://t.co/xIRwU60x1P

Distance now to cover more miles later!We, as responsible citizens, must follow the government policies to curb the #COVID19 pandemic. Monitor your health and consult the doctor at the slightest symptom of an infection. Stay home, stay safe. #SII #Vaccine https://t.co/ZKnO4yvBR1

With the Pandemic-centric information being disseminated every hour, it is crucial to keep ourselves updated with the right set of effective measures and avoid believing unverified and false information.Stay healthy, stay safe, practice proper preventive measures. #SII #vaccine https://t.co/NsPfywEUIS

COVID19 has forced an atmosphere of fear and concern among the citizens of the world. Following a specific plan of action for the day to day functioning of your household and community is of utmost importance in this period of uncertainty and panic. Keep a check on everyone. #SII https://t.co/3bp8BuL2CW
